title: Deals: Google Nest Hubs from $65, latest Nest Cams starting at $80, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are now live and up for the taking headlined by a Google Nest spring sale. Including everything from the latest Assistant speakers and displays from $65 to the recently-refreshed camera discounts starting at $80 and more, you’ll be able to save on nearly all of Google’s Nest devices. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

description: A new Google Nest spring sale has gone live today with price cuts on the latest smart displays and speakers from $65. Plus more!
